name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】みんなありがとう！ぺこーらありがとうLIVE！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [L2y7a_zMi20]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Opening animation with photos of Hololive members and a title card for Pekora's 'Arigatou' Live Birthday 2024.
Usada Pekora performs the song 'Sayonara Memories' on a 3D stage featuring a large cherry blossom tree.

subtitles.original: ぺこーらありがとうLive
subtitles.english: Pekora "Arigatou" Live

subtitles.original: サクラがさくよ
subtitles.english: The cherry blossoms are blooming

subtitles.original: 見なれたいつもの坂道に
subtitles.english: On the familiar slope we always take

subtitles.original: あぁ 別れを
subtitles.english: Ah, this farewell...

subtitles.original:
さよならメモリーズ
作詞・作曲 ryo
subtitles.english:
Sayonara Memories
Lyrics/Composition: ryo

subtitles.original: 泣いて笑った
subtitles.english: We cried and laughed

subtitles.original: あの日々 なんだか昨日のことのよう
subtitles.english: Those days somehow seem like only yesterday

subtitles.original: この道はそう
subtitles.english: This road, yes

subtitles.original: 未来へ続く道
subtitles.english: Is a road leading to the future

subtitles.original: そんな気がしたの
subtitles.english: That's how I felt

subtitles.original: 例年より早い開花
subtitles.english: The blossoms opened earlier than usual this year

subtitles.original: そう 君は嬉しがってた
subtitles.english: Yeah, you were so happy about it

subtitles.original: 私は笑って「そうだね」って言った
subtitles.english: I laughed and said, "You're right"

subtitles.original: あと少ししたらもう ここには戻れないのに
subtitles.english:
Even though in just a little while,
we won't be able to come back here anymore

subtitles.original: 言葉じゃうまく言えない想い
subtitles.english: These feelings I can't put into words well

subtitles.original: 君に打ち明けるとしたらなんて
subtitles.english: If I were to confess them to you, what would I say?

subtitles.original: 伝えよう
subtitles.english: I'll tell you

subtitles.original: 最初で最後
subtitles.english: For the first and last time

subtitles.original: 一緒に帰った道は 私にとって特別な思い出
subtitles.english:
The road we walked home together
is a special memory for me

subtitles.original: 忘れないよ さよならメモリーズ
subtitles.english: I'll never forget. Farewell memories

subtitles.original: 春が来たら それぞれの道を
subtitles.english: When spring comes, we'll each go our separate ways

subtitles.original: また会える日を願って
subtitles.english: Hoping for the day we can meet again

subtitles.original: 「さよなら」小さくつぶやいた
subtitles.english: I whispered "Goodbye" softly

subtitles.original: 空はあの日と変わらず青くて
subtitles.english: The sky was as blue as it was that day

subtitles.original: だからちょっと泣けた
subtitles.english: So I cried a little bit

subtitles.original: わざと遠回りしたの
subtitles.english: I purposefully took the long way around

subtitles.original: 少しでも長く君の隣にいたくて
subtitles.english:
Because I wanted to be by your side
for just a little longer

subtitles.original: 私はおどけて「間違えた」って言った
subtitles.english: I joked around and said I took the wrong turn

subtitles.original: 君は笑う その顔がまぶしくて目をそらした
subtitles.english:
You laughed, and your face was so radiant
that I looked away

subtitles.original: 言葉じゃうまく言えない想い
subtitles.english: These feelings I can't put into words well

subtitles.original: 胸に抱いてこの道を歩いた
subtitles.english: Carrying them in my heart, I walked this road

subtitles.original: 覚えてる あの時君は
subtitles.english: I remember... at that time, you

subtitles.original: 私の名前を呼んでくれた
subtitles.english: Called my name

subtitles.original: 二人 夕暮れの帰り道で 忘れないよ さよならメモリーズ
subtitles.english:
On the road home at dusk, just the two of us
I'll never forget. Farewell memories

subtitles.original: 出会えたこと 感謝してる
subtitles.english: I'm grateful that we met

subtitles.original: 初めて見た 満開のサクラ
subtitles.english:
The full-blown cherry blossoms
I saw for the first time

subtitles.original: あれからどれくらい変われたんだろう
subtitles.english: I wonder how much I've changed since then
